bibl.title: Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 3.1 (December 19, 2013).
bibl.note: Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by M.J. Albarrán, R. Ast, L. Berkes, A. Bernini, A. Boud'hors, W. Clarysse, W.G. Claytor, H. Cuvigny, A. Delattre, E. Garel, J. Gascou, N. Gonis, D. Hagedorn, F.A.J. Hoogendijk, R. Pintaudi, J. Sosin, M. Vierros & M. Zellmann-Rohrer] that were adopted between August 9, 2013 and December 19, 2013. These emendations have not appeared previously in print and are presented together for ease of reference and review.
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast & James Cowey (edd.), Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 3.1 (December 19, 2013).
Heidelberg, Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg, Institut für Papyrologie, 2013, 4 pp.

Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by M.J. Albarrán, R. Ast, L. Berkes, A. Bernini, A. Boud'hors, W. Clarysse, W.G. Claytor, H. Cuvigny, A. Delattre, E. Garel, J. Gascou, N. Gonis, D. Hagedorn, F.A.J. Hoogendijk, R. Pintaudi, J. Sosin, M. Vierros & M. Zellmann-Rohrer] that were adopted between August 9, 2013 and December 19, 2013. These emendations have not appeared previously in print and are presented together for ease of reference and review.
Ast Cowey Albarrán Berkes Bernini Boud'hors Clarysse Claytor Cuvigny Delattre Garel Gascou Gonis Hagedorn Hoogendijk Pintaudi Sosin Vierros Zellmann-Rohrer
